elements.name: question5
elements.title: According to this audio text, what is meant by cloud computing?
elements.correctAnswer: Working on the computer with data from the network.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What are the advantages according to the audio text?
elements.correctAnswer: The software does not need to be kept up to date, as the provider ensures that computer crashes have no consequences.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What disadvantages are mentioned?
elements.correctAnswer: Only access when you are online, providers can go bankrupt, some providers analyze usage data.
